backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining user profiles, shops, products, carts, bargains, and messages with access control and CRUD-style APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a deployment-related feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing routing, UI components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes with color tokens and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all app routes and wraps the UI in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo, navigation, share button, login button, and a mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that composes the header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard that shows a login prompt when unauthenticated and renders children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/BargainRequestFo: Form component allowing authenticated users to submit bargain offers with price conversion and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/BestDealRequestB: Button that sends a predefined 'best deal' bargain request for a product via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ShareLiveLinkBut: Button that copies a generated live share URL to the clipboard and shows feedback tooltips.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refetches queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login flow, stored identities and related utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend operations for profiles, products, shops and other data mutations/queries.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme variables and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart with product details, loading/error states, subtotal calculation, and navigation to product browsing.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesThreadPage.ts: Shows a chat thread for a product, loading messages and product info, handling message sending, and rendering real-time conversation UI.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed product and shop info with actions like add-to-cart, message shopkeeper, and bargain features.
frontend/src/pages/ShopDiscoveryPage.tsx: Provides a product discovery landing page with hero content, error/loading states, and navigation to product details.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProductsPag: Allows shopkeepers to view and manage their products, including creating new listings via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/ShopkeeperProfileForm: React page that renders a shop profile creation form with validation and submits data via a mutation before navigating to the products page.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Provides functions to normalize backend errors into user-friendly messages and detect authentication-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Utility functions to format USD-cent bigint prices as INR and convert INR values back to USD cents.
frontend/src/utils/liveShareUrl.ts: Generates a clean shareable URL by stripping query and hash parameters from the current location.
frontend/src/utils/phoneLinks.ts: Formats phone numbers for WhatsApp deep links and tel: links by cleaning non-numeric characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, container queries, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, summarizing app features, schema version, and implemented backend and frontend capabilities.
